pr_title: Add notification BEFORE nmz overload expires

timeline.body: Why is this not just `overloadNotificationSend = false`? It looks like this would break if you flipped the plugin off/on while overloaded currently.
timeline.bodyText: Why is this not just overloadNotificationSend = false? It looks like this would break if you flipped the plugin off/on while overloaded currently.
timeline.bodyHTML: Why is this not just overloadNotificationSend = false? It looks like this would break if you flipped the plugin off/on while overloaded currently.
timeline.author: Adam-

timeline.body:
```
Duration overloadWarningOffset = OVERLOAD_DURATION.minus(Duration.ofSeconds(config.overloadEarlyWarningSeconds()));
```
can just be here. It isn't necessary to store the config value yourself.
timeline.bodyText:
Duration overloadWarningOffset = OVERLOAD_DURATION.minus(Duration.ofSeconds(config.overloadEarlyWarningSeconds()));

can just be here. It isn't necessary to store the config value yourself.
timeline.bodyHTML:
Duration overloadWarningOffset = OVERLOAD_DURATION.minus(Duration.ofSeconds(config.overloadEarlyWarningSeconds()));

can just be here. It isn't necessary to store the config value yourself.
timeline.author: Adam-

timeline.body: Probably the overloadNotificationSend / config.overloadEarlyWarningSeconds() checks should just be in here instead then.
timeline.bodyText: Probably the overloadNotificationSend / config.overloadEarlyWarningSeconds() checks should just be in here instead then.
timeline.bodyHTML: Probably the overloadNotificationSend / config.overloadEarlyWarningSeconds() checks should just be in here instead then.
timeline.author: Adam-

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
min = OVERLOAD_WARNING_LIMIT_MIN,
min = 0,
timeline.author: Adam-

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
max = OVERLOAD_WARNING_LIMIT_MAX
max = 300
timeline.author: Adam-

timeline.message:
nmz plugin: add option to send overload notification prior to expire

Co-authored-by: Adam <Adam@sigterm.info>

nmz plugin: add option to send overload notification prior to expire
